abstract: In a day of light, pre-holiday trading, investors clawed back some of their losses from earlier in the week, with industrial companies leading the gains.
snippet: In a day of light, pre-holiday trading, investors clawed back some of their losses from earlier in the week, with industrial companies leading the gains.
lead_paragraph: In a day of light trading, investors clawed back some of their losses from earlier in the week after an unemployment report showed that job losses were continuing to ebb.

headline.main: Wall Street Pushes Higher to Close Week
headline.print_headline: Investors Regain Some Losses To End Bad Week for Markets
